text: Anumzantimoka, kagra mika vahe'mota tamarimpa rezaganenka negenka, knare hu'za fatgo avu'avazama nehaza vahera muse hunezmantane. Nagra fatgo hu'na nagu'areti navesigante'na ama maka zantamina eme negamina, menina negogeno vaheka'amo'za eme atru hu'za musezampinti zamagra'a zamavesite mika ofazamia eme negamize.
